title: Provides that towers, including communications towers, may not be erected on special parkway lands without the consent of the local government
summary: Provides that towers, including communications towers, etc., may not be erected on special parkway lands (Westchester county) without the consent of the local government in which located and must comply with all local laws, regulations, etc.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2496

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 19, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. PRETLOW -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Transportation

       AN ACT to amend the transportation law, in relation to the  erection  of
         certain towers on special parkway lands

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The transportation law is amended by adding a  new  section
    2  71-a to read as follows:
    3    S  71-A.  SPECIAL  PARKWAYS; ERECTION OF TOWERS.   NOTWITHSTANDING ANY
    4  INCONSISTENT PROVISION OF LAW, THE COMMISSIONER SHALL NOT  ERECT,  CAUSE
    5  OR  PERMIT  TO BE ERECTED, GRANT EASEMENTS OR LICENSES FOR, OR OTHERWISE
    6  FACILITATE THE ERECTION OF, ANY TOWER, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO  ANY
    7  TOWER  USED FOR TELECOMMUNICATIONS, CELLULAR TELEPHONE, POLICE, OR OTHER
    8  EMERGENCY OR PUBLIC SERVICES COMMUNICATIONS,  SATELLITE  COMMUNICATIONS,
    9  OR  DIGITAL OR PCS COMMUNICATIONS, ON LANDS OF ANY SPECIAL PARKWAY WITH-
   10  OUT THE CONSENT OF THE CITY, TOWN, OR VILLAGE IN WHICH  SUCH  LANDS  ARE
   11  LOCATED. ANY SUCH USE SHALL CONFORM IN ALL RESPECTS TO ANY AND ALL LOCAL
   12  LAWS, ORDINANCES, RESOLUTIONS, RULES, AND REGULATIONS.
   13    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD05930-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the transportation law, in relation to the erection of certain towers on special parkway lands
